text: Mominpur Metro Station is a station of the Kolkata Metro in Mominpur, Kolkata, India. The underground station is located beneath Diamond harbour road in Mominpur. It is a station of Kolkata Metro Line 3. This station will be built in the second phase of the construction of the Kolkata Metro Line 3. There will be two platforms at this station. == References == Category:Kolkata Metro stations Category:Railway stations in Kolkata
title: Mominpur metro station
